OUR DEDICATION 
TO GIVING BACK
COMMITMENT TO ORGANIZATIONS THAT SHARE OUR VALUES
• We support people and organizations committed to moving our country and our world forward. 
• Our Political Action Committee (PAC) supports only those politicians that align with our values.
•  We give only to those that support a worker’s right to unionize.
• Not a dime goes to climate change deniers.
•   We don’t contribute to those who try to withhold rights from the LGBTQ community or who work against a woman’s 
right to choose.
